headline: Mount Sinai Increases Effort to Cut Medical-Student Debt
summary: New York’s Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai announced it will expand scholarships in a bid to lower the total debt of its medical students, a move that follows other recent debt-relief efforts at New York medical schools.

headline: Latest Ghosn Search Exposes Japan’s Feeble Attorney-Client Privilege

headline: Yellen Offers a Warning to Trump’s Central Bank Picks

headline: Fusion Connect Scrambles After Board Member’s Investment Fizzles

The company said it would ask its lenders to enter into standstill agreements and explore options to restructure debt or raise new capital.
